text: "A Little Less Talk and a Lot More Action" is a 1992 song by Hank Williams Jr. from his 44th studio album Maverick. It was covered by Toby Keith for his 1993 album Toby Keith. It went to number 2 on the Billboard Hot Country Songs chart and number 25 on the Canadian Country Tracks chart. ==Notes== Category:1992 songs Category:Country songs Category:Hank Williams Jr. songs Category:Toby Keith songs
title: A Little Less Talk and a Lot More Action
